Rules Text: Adds an additional E damage for every 3 EN <equipper> has stored.

Flavor Text: Over one hundred times more powerful than an M80.

Notes: maybe only destroy arm weapons with this ability

Rules Text: Each time <self> is fired add a charge counter to it. [Powerful 1]
(1C)(5EN): Return target weapon from your [scrapheap] to your hand.
[Legendary] If also attacking with Guildenstern add 6E damage.
[Locked] At the end of your turn <self> deals twice the number of cooldown counters on it to <equipper> in explosive damage.
n is the number of cooldown counters on all your equipment.
